description: Ready in 15 minutes, this speedy potato salad with flaked crispy-skinned salmon, salad leaves, gherkins and yoghurt dressing is the perfect midweek dinner.
name: Quick Salmon & Potato Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 500g Woolworths simply steam microwavable baby white potatoes
0.5 red onion, thinly sliced into rounds
100g sweet spiced gherkins, drained, quartered lengthways

recipeInstructions.text: Microwave potatoes according to packet instructions. Cool for 5 minutes.

Meanwhile, heat oil in a large frying pan over medium heat. Cook salmon, skin-side down, for 4 minutes or until skin is crisp and golden. Turn and cook for 3 minutes for medium or until cooked to your liking. Transfer to a plate.
Remove potatoes from packaging and halve. Combine yoghurt and lemon juice in a small bowl.
Place potato, salad leaves, onion and gherkins in a large bowl and toss to combine. Flake over salmon. Serve drizzled with yoghurt mixture and seasoned with pepper.
